}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *The [[Roku HD]] is a Netflix/Pandora/MLB TV streaming device with built-in WiFi.
This module used in the models: *[[Roku DVP (N1000)]] *[[Roku SD (N1050)]] *[[Roku HD (N1100)]] {{see also|Roku}}
It contains a daughterboard holding the Wi-Fi components including :two U.FL connectors in addition to two onboard antennas. Device is using the [[Atheros]] rebranded ZD1211B (AR2524). :Not a standard USB connector.
==Links of Interest== :[[wikipedia:Roku|'''Roku''' on Wikipedia]] :[http://support.roku.com/entries/20345913-Product-Comparison-All-Roku-Player-Models Product Comparison All Roku Player Models]
